thread.title: i'd give it 3.5 stars!
thread.title_full: i'd give it 3.5 stars! - Review of The Nadler Victoria, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Stav S
title: i'd give it 3.5 stars!
text:
the nadler victoria offers one one hand- a relatively cheap stay right next to buckingham palace- its very convenient to get to and from the city center.
we took the most basic room- which means there was no bath tub- on the plus side, the rooms are rather big and come with a kitchenette so you can make your own coffee (comes with a nespresso machine!) and your meals of you would like. in one side the room is filled with some nice gadget (smart TV and so on), on the other hand- the basic room is in an underground floor and the energy saving systems sometimes causes you to go outside into a dark hallway that will light up like in a horror movie :)
the staff is extremely helpful and friendly and make really good suggestions! so that's a huge plus :)
Room Tip: they are building right in front - ask for yard facing rooms... See more room tips
